taimuchatto.description: ðŸ§‹ TaimuChatto is a real-time, full-stack chat application utilizing the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and Socket.io. It features secure JWT authentication and instant messaging.

Heart-Disease-Risk-Prediction.title: Heart Disease Risk Prediction
Heart-Disease-Risk-Prediction.description: A web application built with Streamlit for predicting heart disease risk based on demographic and lifestyle factors using a trained C4.5 Decision Tree model.
